author: tantnd
title: JobFair platform on Cardano
description: Most of the job search sites today are based on the mechanism: Hirer-Broker-Freelancer. The broker in the middle receives a commission

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal does not adequately address the impact criteria with an appropriate amount of detail.  The overall concept of a Cardano based platform to bring employers and workers together is great however does not provide enough detail to convince me they will be capable of succeeding in such an ambitious endeavor. It would be helpful for the proposer to breakdown the solution into smaller projects all building upon one another.  This would allow more detail and provide more confidence.  Another suggestion to the proposer is do a spell and grammar check.  In my prior experience reviewing proposals most reviewers would review negatively a poorly written proposal.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer has provided several milestones with high level detail within each milestone however the large scope of this project calls into question if the milestones are realistic.  The proposer provides a breakdown of staff cost, development time and costs.  My experience with offshoring development cost make me believe the proposer can hire the needed staff at the substantially lower cost. However, I am not convinced the team has adequately scoped the project and am concerned they have overreached on an audacious project, while a great idea, and will not be able to complete.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer has provided high level KPIs related to each milestone however the proposal lacks the specific details you expect to track success.  The proposer indicating success looks like thousands of people on the platform is aspirational and not a measurable plan.  I would have preferred to see something along the lines of release of demo with testing from 2-4 employers, recruiters, etc and a community of job seekers, etc.  The proposer would benefit from having users ready to begin testing the platform rather “build it and they will come”.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal fits the challenge idea and can be very impactful for the current community of Cardano and also is a attractive way to make other people come to Cardano universe. There are a lot of people that works as freelancers but don´t make the amount of money that they deserve because of the dificult of finding a job or because of the platforms fees. This proposal is a great and useful way to solve this problem and also facilitate to employers to find good talents to work.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposers explained well the details about the members that will be part of the project. Each one of the professionals that will work on the proposal is indispensable because of the nature of the activity of building a digital product (platform). Although the amount of money requested on the proposal is big, it's fair because of the expected impact of it and the job that need to be done by each one of the professionals exposed on the proposal. The milestones presented helps us CA's to understand the proposal feasibility as possible and plausible because it's well explained and shows the test periods in each fase of the project.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal milestones are well explained and make sense due to the kind of project we're dealing with. Also the problem and the solution were well explained. Despite this, the proposers mencioned that they used the metric of amount of users on platform, but I missed numbers to demarcate the goal. It's easier to audit the proposal success if we have numbers in the goals, for example: in the first month the platform will have a thousand of users.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal has a fantastic idea that will definitely give an impact on the community and will definitely add up a lot of value in the future if it is successfully implemented. It is very creative and will help people in the blockchain community to find a job, especially with freelancers, the normal job site does not emphasize the Blockchain job and they find it hard to find one that also does not underestimate their ability. I totally agree with this idea.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal has a clear roadmap with the 4 milestones, each milestone has its detailed activities to build up the proposal in the 8 months period. They also advertise their project on other platforms like Tiktok, Facebook to gain more reputation. The team members is detailed listed out with links to track their background and they all have experiences to adopt this proposal, Software Engineer, marketing, project manager positions - very solid team setting. The budget is broken down in detail and very careful consideration, they ask for 78,3k for the period of 8 months to operate the app is pretty reasonable, it might need more maintenance fee after that but this will be considered after they successfully operated. This proposal is very well written and calculated and I believe it can be implemented successfully. I do not have many more ideas to share, great team and good luck.
f6_assessments.q2: They provided a Github link to track the team activities, as the final product is the app so it will take time for them to build the app and key metrics and success elements are all mentioned. Although there is no specific number is written but their first job is to successfully build the app and then attract people. Therefore I find the key metrics are reasonable. I hope this project can be successfully built and bring more value to the Cardano community by helping proposers or corporations to find their talents best fit for the job.

f6_assessments.q0: Problem statement Most of the job search sites today are based on the mechanism: Hirer-Broker-Freelancer. The broker in the middle receives a commission. Solution to establish a platform to connect employers and talent, 0% service fees. Built on Cardano blockchain with SmartContract, crypto for payments.The point stated is clear to eliminate the middleman position of the old model and smart contract application as well as crypto payments between employers and freelancers.With Cardano and Catalyst in the midst of intense development in need of developers. ' resources to ensure successful acquisition and implementation of many projects, it would be great to have this proposal developed on top of Cardano. specifically, the proponent stated that the website will connect to the Freelancer wallet and the employer's wallet through the Yoroi Wallet Extension to create profile information and add personal skills. Through profiles and search commands, the system will find related jobs posted fr om employers and connect via chatbox / email. After the two sides shake hands. Freelancer will send an invoice to the employer and wait to receive the ADA from the employer and send it to his wallet and the two parties will send feedback to each other. There is a point where the proponent should add more clarity to the automatic conditions for the execution of these smart contracts. I am impressed with the platform that can run sustainably with 0% service fee. The proponent also states some risks and solutions, among which the risk of occurrence of personal conflicts of interest (for example, not paying or reluctantly sabotaging by sending false feedback to cause controversy). This needs to be analyzed for smart contract changes or flagging warnings for non-compliant parties, which can be endless without clear rules.
f6_assessments.q1: The proponent provides the roadmap and implementation time of the contents on a monthly basis for each specific period. The official release adoption of the platform on social networks 8 months after being funded. I highly recommend the following (Building a mechanism for monitoring, alerting, etc., and resolution / Benchmarking system / Enhancing infrastructure reliability and resiliency) The proposed costs are also clearly stated, most of which are paid for 7 employees of the team, calculated based on working time and server and domain costs. proponent has stated that the brokerage fee is 0%, so how to maintain this project after the end of funding?. The identity of the team of 6 is fully provided with position assignment and experience, expertise, linkedin
f6_assessments.q2: Indicators that measure project progress and development are based on milestones and some are difficult to measure. The successful goal of the project is that thousands of people use this platform to find jobs, many employers use this platform to find talent. This is a project of the team, I also know some of the team members are also working on some new projects funds in fund 7

f6_assessments.q0:
This proposal is a very useful initiative. In the era of information technology boom, the number of jobs increased resulting in job search websites sprang up a lot to try to exploit the full potential of people in all fields, all levels. Most job search sites have brokers in the middle (receiving commissions), which is not good for the parties involved.
This proposal creates a platform to connect employers and talent, 0% service fees. Built on Cardano blockchain with SmartContract, crypto for payments. This will be a potential solution using the power of smart contracts of Cardano, bringing Cardano blockchain closer and more valuable to everybody.
f6_assessments.q1:
The team members have full skills, knowledge, experience in various fields: payment, social network, blockchain integration, programming, marketing, management,... Besides, we can easily verify the transparency thanks to the Linkedin links provided. Based on the above ideas, I believe that this team is fully capable of carrying out the project.
The roadmap is specific, you have identified 4 important milestones to complete this project, thereby allocating work in each time period appropriately. The budget is detailed, which increases the transparency of the project. Also, I appreciate your deduction (2.6 months) for the budget part.
Indicators to measure the progress and development of the project are provided, however, it would be better to have specific metrics such as: Weekly number of users 100,... That will make it easier for everyone to track and evaluate its success.
f6_assessments.q2:
After reading the proposal, plus looking at the model you attached. I think the information provided is complete and transparent. People can rely on it for evaluation and monitoring.
I fully believe this project can be done successfully, hope it will be funded. If that's true, it would be of great value: thousand people can use the platform to find jobs, many employers can use the platform to search for talents. More broadly, bringing to the community a platform running on Cardano that brings sustainable value, promotes the development of the Cardano ecosystem.

solution: Establish a platform to connect employers and talent, 0% service fees. Built on Cardano blockchain with SmartContract, crypto for payments.
experience: We are a team of young talented engineers, with experience at large corp. and startup in Vietnam, participating in the product development to serve hundreds of thousands to millions of users in different industries fields such as Payment, Social network, Blockchain integration.
